issue.title: Model Editor: Joints not properly placed when parts have been manipulated

content.raw:
mm ok I thought I had fixed this issue in either the `model_editor` branch or the `model_editor_joint_maker` branch...will take a look.

Part == Link. We used to call it Part as it was believed that it sounds more natural. However this can be confusing for long time gazebo users. @spaepcke I think I've asked you a few times before but I don't remember if we concluded on this or not - any objections to calling it Links instead of Parts?
content.html:
mm ok I thought I had fixed this issue in either the model_editor branch or the model_editor_joint_maker branch...will take a look.

Part == Link. We used to call it Part as it was believed that it sounds more natural. However this can be confusing for long time gazebo users. @spaepcke I think I've asked you a few times before but I don't remember if we concluded on this or not - any objections to calling it Links instead of Parts?
